prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Drums, Piano, and Chromatic Percussion, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Drums, Piano, and Chromatic Percussion, omitting the Guitar.

Style 3:
Guitar is absent from this song, which instead includes Bass, Drums, Piano, and Chromatic Percussion.
